About Me

Hey, I'm Silver

BIO

I’m a bilingual Backend Software developer from El Paso, Tx, currently living in the outdoorsy city of Denver, CO. I have a bachelor's degree in Biochemistry from Texas Tech University, which introduced me to coding world. When I’m not coding, you can find me outside performing some sort of outdoor activity (skiing, backpacking, off-roading), or inside observing my aquascaped aquarium. I’m Constantly learning web technologies and other backend related topics, currently playing around with Go and Docker. I love meeting new people, so please feel free to shoot me a text or email.

Best At

    -Ruby on Rails
    -Test-driven development
    -Object Oriented Programming
    -RESTful Web Design
    -API integration

Looking For

    -Fun Working Environment
    -Mentorship
    -Supportive Environment That Fosters Growth
    -Collaborative Workspace

Hobbies

    -Skiing
    -Overlanding/off-roading
    -Aquascaping
